title: New Yoga Classes Announced
content: We are excited to announce new yoga classes starting this June. Join us for a rejuvenating experience!

title: YogaFlex App Update
content: The YogaFlex app has been updated with new features and improved performance. Make sure to update your app!

title: International Yoga Day Event
content: Celebrate International Yoga Day with us! Join our special event with live sessions and workshops.
